baseData.description:
Put a random Commander card from your deck into your hand.
If you have more evolution points than your opponent, subtract 1 from that card's cost. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)

Choose: Put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Mina, Levin Vice Leader
-Mona, Levin Mage
-Mena, Levin Duelist
Enhance (7): Put 1 of each into your hand instead, and recover 6 play points.

Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
If this is your fifth turn or later, recover 1 play point.
Then, if this is your tenth turn or later, give +1/+1 to all allied followers.

Fanfare: If at least 1 allied follower has evolved this match, gain Ward.
Then, if at least 3 have evolved, recover 3 play points.
Then, if at least 5 have evolved, restore 5 defense to your leader.
Then, if at least 7 have evolved, draw cards until there are 7 cards in your hand.
